Title: Binding from Qur'an
Dimensions: Folio H: 5 1/8 x W: 3 9/16 in. (13 x 9 cm)
Medium: black leather with gold and blue paper endpapers
Description: This 19th-century Ottoman Turkish black leather binding from Walters manuscript W.577 is decorated with a tooled and gold-painted geometric design enclosed by frames, including a wide frame with tooled chain-link design.
Keywords: Koran; Qur`an; Arabic; Islamic; Ottoman; Book; Calligraphy; Codex; Colophon; Illumination; Manuscript; Turkey
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Turkish
